text: Pa ri qꞌij ri xuchapleꞌj loq Juan Bꞌanal qasanaꞌ utzijoxik ri utzij ri Dios ri Juan Bꞌanal qasanaꞌ, kꞌa pa taq we qꞌij riꞌ, tajin kanimar ri ajawarem rech ri Dios, pune e kꞌo uꞌkꞌulel. Xaq xwi ri e winaq ri kakibꞌan kichuqꞌabꞌ xuqujeꞌ kuchap kikꞌuꞌx, xaq xwi waꞌ koꞌk pa ri ajawarem rech ri Dios.
